haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Lambrecht Steinberg
Obltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Fritz Bernert
Ltn Florian Lasch

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 16/05/1916 near StMihiel.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.67 was brought down by Wenzel Scheiner of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Jehan Lacoume was killed in action.
Wenzel Scheiner was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 16/05/1916 near Golancourt Sub.
A F.E.2b of Esc 19 was brought down by Patrik Schorner of Jasta 4.
Etienne Tavel was killed in action.
Augustin Tournaire was made a prisoner of war.
Patrik Schorner was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: French pushers attack our aerodrome.  We rise to meet them and bring them both down.  One lands and the gunner continues to fire at me.  I hope that our troops shoot them when the come upon them.
